CustomProperties.Name: LabelText
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Text to display as the field label

CustomProperties.Name: PlaceholderText
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Hint text for the input field

CustomProperties.Name: IsRequired
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Whether the field is required (shows asterisk)

CustomProperties.Name: DefaultValue
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Default value for the input field

CustomProperties.Name: SectionTitle
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Title displayed in the section header

CustomProperties.Name: IsCollapsible
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Whether the section can be collapsed

CustomProperties.Name: IsExpanded
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Whether the section is currently expanded

CustomProperties.Name: ShowWhen
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Condition that determines if section is visible
